meanings.sent1: The red apple was the foremost fruit in the basket.
meanings.sent2: She is the foremost student in the class, always getting top grades.
meanings.sent3: The cat considered itself the foremost ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: His kindness shines as the foremost quality in his character.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse stood as the foremost beacon of hope for sailors in the storm.

meanings.sent1: The foremost reason for his success was hard work.
meanings.sent2: The CEO is the foremost decision-maker in the company.
meanings.sent3: The clown declared himself the foremost entertainer at the circus.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the foremost melody in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The captain was the foremost authority on navigating the treacherous waters.

meanings.sent1: The foremost car in the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: He held the foremost position in the company as the CEO.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel claimed the foremost spot on the tree branch.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays illuminated the foremost peak of the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The champion boxer was the foremost contender for the title match.
